Package io.helidon.webserver

Class RequestPredicate.ConditionalHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.webserver.RequestPredicate.ConditionalHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler, java.util.function.BiConsumer<ServerRequest,ServerResponse>
    Enclosing interface:
    RequestPredicate

    public static class RequestPredicate.ConditionalHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Handler
    A Handler which executes provided logic only if provided condition is satisfied. An instance can be created using RequestPredicate.thenApply(Handler) method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.helidon.webserver.Handler

        Handler.EntityHandler<T>

      • otherwise

        public Handler otherwise​(Handler handler)
        Creates new Handler instance which executes this handler if condition was satisfied, otherwise executes provided handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - a handler which is executed when condition was not satisfied.
        Returns:
        a new handler.
